data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gillespie, Lynn J., Soreng, Robert John, Cabi, Evren, Amiri, Neda (2018): Phylogeny and taxonomic synopsis of PoasubgenusPseudopoa (including Eremopoa and Lindbergella) (Poaceae, Poeae, Poinae). PhytoKeys 111: 69-102, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.111.28081, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.111.28081
